title: 【Limited Creative】插件与【Multiinv】
author: 我chao爱MC
txt_content: 要实现Limited Creative http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... p;highlight=Limited 必须要用Multinv，所以安装了插件和前置插件，但是Limited Creative 确报告错误，Due to conflict with the plugin MultiInv, the feature Inventory is disabled

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
首先在官方还有一段字：
This feature isn't compatible to other plugins that modifies the inventory on gamemode- or world-change, like Multiverse-Inventories, MultiInv and such. If LC detects one of the known plugins it is incompatible to, the Inventory feature is automatically disabled and gives a warning in server.log. To prevent the warning, just disable the feature in config.大概的意思就是不支持修改背包内容的插件（例如MV或者MW）如果检测到有安装的话会自动取消背包功能。

你那一段字大概意思就是这个插件不会限制不同世界的背包，只会限制游戏模式的背包，如果你想不同世界，不同模式都有不同的背包的话需要用“multiverse-inventories”这款多世界背包插件（和multiinv差不多）然后在配设文件内把背包功能取消掉。
不过这个多世界背包默认只限制不同世界的背包，如果想实现不同世界，不同模式的话需要修改配设了：
把use_game_mode_profiles: false 改成 true

replies.author: 我chao爱MC
replies.txt_content:
No! This plugin won't separate the inventories based on the world. It only decides via gamemode, that won't be changed. If you like to have a separation via world and via gamemode, use the "Multiverse-Inventories" plugin and disable LCs Inventory-Feature. By default MV-Inv. only separates via world, and not via gamemode, but that can be changed by the MV-Inv-Config-Option: use_game_mode_profiles: true
请问怎么设置？应该是对的啊
